DESCRIPTION: Create a new event in your server so people can RSVP.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}eventcreate** ~ Creates a brand new event using the default template.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}eventcreate [Template Name]** ~ Creates an event from an existing template.
DEFAULT_TITLE: Time To Get Your Game On!
DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Join the event to let others know you will be able to play with them at the time of the event.
CREATE_FAILED: Sorry, an error has occurred and I was unable to create an event for you. Please contact my developers with the **.fb dev your message here.**.
CREATE_SUCCESS: You have successfully created a new event on this server with an ID of **[ {{number}} ]**.
